meanings.definition: Enough or more than enough; plentiful.
meanings.sent1: There was ample food for everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The garden had ample sunlight for the plants to grow well.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found an ample supply of acorns for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room with an ample joy.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall provided an ample display of natural beauty.

meanings.definition: Large in size or amount; spacious.
meanings.sent1: The ample room in the house allowed for comfortable living.
meanings.sent2: The ample parking lot could accommodate all the cars for the event.
meanings.sent3: The cat found an ample box to play and hide in.
meanings.sent4: His heart was an ample space for all her love.
meanings.sent5: The forest was an ample playground for the children.

meanings.definition: Fully sufficient or more than adequate.
meanings.sent1: She had an ample amount of time to finish the project.
meanings.sent2: The backpack had ample supplies for the camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled an ample number of rabbits out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was an ample gift to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The library offered an ample selection of books for all ages.
